package.name: noNotch
package.shortDescription: Updated for iOS 13 and arm64e by nicho1asdev, originally made by jakeashacks. Hides the notch on iPhone X and above. Issues are present. Source code: https://github.com/jakeajames/noNotch

descriptionlist.description: Should be compatible with iOS 11 to iOS 13, if not, please send me a message on Twitter @itsnicho1as.

changelog.change: * Partially fixed an annoying issue where the status bar and notch cover wouldn’t be there while the device was locked. This would cause a “flash” when unlocking the device. Now, only the status bar is gone while the device is locked, getting rid of the “flash”.
